name: Montbre
description:
Montbre is a WW2 fps where you take control of units on the map by hopping between their perspectives. You can jump from one soldier to another soldier if you prefer their loadout, or if you need support from the air you can track down one of your planes and take control of that too.

I last worked on this project around a year ago but if people are interested I can go back to working on it regularly. There are bugs lol.

Content :

Two Factions

One Map

12 Guns split between factions

2 Tanks split between factions

2 Planes split between factions

3 Game modes (Defense, Conquest, KOTH)

Controls :

Fire - Left Mouse Button

Zoom - Right Mouse Button

Movement - WASD

Crouch - CTRL

Control Wheel - Q   (Must be looking at a friendly unit)

Buy Menu - E              (Defense mode only)

Reload - R 

Swap Weapons - Mouse Wheel OR Number Row
